Title: Leader of the Shadepaw Pack
Description:
Kargpaw is the true leader of the gnolls in this part of the forest. We've had... unpleasant encounters with him in the past.

This time was different. He carried a strange totem that seemed to twist his very essence.

Kargpaw must be stopped and this totem recovered. I fear the gnolls are meddling in something darker than we can imagine.
ObjectivesText: Kill Kargpaw and recover his totem.
PortraitGiverText: Kargpaw has always been malicious, but he's become more aggressive now that he carries a foul totem.
RewardText:
<Brena recoils in disgust as she accepts the totem.>

Kargpaw was always violent, but he was also a coward. He and his band never attacked us if we traveled in large numbers.

Something has changed... and this totem is behind it.
